title: New: Jens Kuross – Nobody's Problem
body:
More than a touch of Harry Nilsson, or even Big Starr on this new track from **Jens Kuross**.

A tension fraught piano ballad, it’s an endearingly honest listen, showcasing some sublime songwriting skills. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
